WebLink.description: This custom link displays a packing slip when launched from an Opportunity.
WebLink.url: https://www.dreamfactory.net/sforce/formfactory/formfactory.html? sforce_session_id={!API.Session_ID}& sforce_server_url={!API.Partner_Server_URL_120}& sforce_user_name={!User.Username}& sforce_full_name={!User.Name}& sforce_user_id={!User.Id}& custom_link_name=Simple Packing Slip& myaccount={!Opportunity.AccountId}& myopportunity={!Opportunity.Id}& myuser={!User.Id}& todaysdate={!TODAY()}
